news_header: Seven churches in New Zealand were targeted in a suspected arson attack, causing significant damage but no injuries.
news_original_title: Seven New Zealand churches targeted in suspected arson spree
news_text: In New Zealand, seven churches were targeted in a suspected arson attack, with four in Masterton suffering moderate to significant damage. Fire crews responded early Saturday, and the fires are being treated as suspicious, with police involved. No injuries were reported, and local officials expressed shock at the attacks. A video surfaced showing a man claiming responsibility, expressing anti-religious sentiments. This incident follows a troubling trend of arson attacks on religious buildings in New Zealand, including previous incidents in Auckland and Christchurch.
